name: Twas the Dream after Pizza
description:
A short narrative text adventure taking inspiration from the styles of The Hitchhikers Guide, The Stanley Parable, and The Night before Christmas story book.

Join Billy on a brief adventure that will span his entire world and may cause him to question the very nature of his existence.

Without further ado, we proudly present: 

...well title's shown above, I guess we don't need to repeat it here. Enjoy!
